channel.title: A few minor changes to the game
channel.description:
# 1: It should be more clear that you cannot use both day abilities on classes there this is true # 2: On the Good King's Classcard, it should say that you cannot use Safegaurd on the same person twice in a row # 3: The Glossary should be able to be accessed in the classcards
(I thought of these because of [this](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G8JS18CB630) TwoP video)
